greenFeelings.text: Go quiet and remove myself from the situation
Just want to be alone with my thoughts
Tend to reflect and keep my thoughts to myself
Want someone I can talk the problem through with
Am willing to ask for help
Need to vent my frustrations with someone and free myself

red-frustration.text: Tend to speak first and think later
Can be direct and insensitive to others feelings
May say things in the heat of the moment and regret them later.
Want to solve the problem I'm facing
Want to take quick action to fix things
Have a need to do something now to improve the situation

purple-focus.text: Imagine problems to be bigger and worse in my mind
Can feel low and depreesed for a while
Have a tendency to think of worst-case scenario
Can find it hard to concentarte
Can find it hard to stick with one task and give it my full attention
Can't make my mind up and will keep delaying a challenging task

blue-fault.text: Have a tendency to blame myself
Belive I could have done things better
Can point the finger at others
Think others have let me down

faq:
My Credits:

You will get 10 points each for:

  1. Participating in the weekly /social Day activities.
  2. When your colleagues agree that you are not letting personal problems interfere with your standard of work. And you seek advice about any problems or conflict you're facing with a colleague or senior.

You will get 5 points each for when:

  1. You have used the sleep App and you can demonstrate at least 6 hours quality sleep.
  2. 2. You can validate you have had 5 portions of fruit and veg the day before.
  3. You have taken your breaks and not worked continuously for longer than 10 hours.

Your colleagues in the Toolbox meeting will award you 10 points each when:

  1. You have talked about a near miss that you have raised in the tool box meeting / monthly safety meeting.
  2. You have talked about a STOP WORK CARD that you have raised in the tool box meeting / monthly safety meeting.

You will get 10 points each for:

  1. You have conducted 2 or more FAB observations this week.
  2. You have had at least 1 meal today with your colleagues and not alone.
  3. You have awarded two or more colleagues a recognition card.

Your HOD will award you 20 points when:

  1. You have talked through your key tasks for today and fully understood the hazards and how you will work safely.
  2. You have followed Bridge Procedures, talked through navigational hazards at each change of watch and fully understood the hazards and how you will navigate safely.
  3. You can evidence that you double-checked and summarized any instructions you were given yesterday by a colleague or a senior.
  4. You can evidence, even under pressure, you did not take a short-cut.
  5. You have engaged in a weekly call with your ship's technical Supt / monthly for technical manager and discussed matters of mutual concern.
  6. You have engaged in at least one of the weekly calls with your ship's technical Supt / technical manager alongside senior officers every month and discussed matters of mutual concern.

You will receive 10 bonus points when:

  1. You have worked for 30 days with No Injury.
  2. Nil PSC Observation Inspection.
  3. 2 Vetting Observations/Inspection.
  4. You are Safety Champion of the Month for having raised MAX Near Misses + Stop Work Cards - Stop Work Cards Received in that month.

My Debits:

You will lose 20 points for:

  1. Every PPE related STOP WORK: not wearing the right safety gear in the right place, eg goggles on your head, but not covering your eyes, gloves are in your pockets and not on your hands, helmet is on your head but not using the chin strap.

You will lose 40 points for:

  1. Every PROCESS related STOP WORK: taking a short-cut and non-compliance with a procedure.
  2. Every PSC Inspection or SIRE/CDI/Flag State Inspection with more than 2 Observations / Inspection.

SERIOUS LAPSE PENALTY: T-CUP credits are reset to ‘zero’ each time you are involved in an injury or accidents causing personal harm, a navigational incident, a Port State Control Detention, a Vetting Rejection, adverse terminal feedback.
